speaker: HORATIO
text: What are they that would speak with me?

speaker: GENTLEMAN
text: Seafaring men, sir. They say they have

speaker: GENTLEMAN
text: letters for you.

speaker: HORATIO
text:
Let them come in.
                 
                Gentleman
                 
                exits
                .
               I do not

speaker: HORATIO
text: know from what part of the world I should be

speaker: HORATIO
text: greeted, if not from Lord Hamlet.

speaker: SAILOR
text: God bless you, sir.

speaker: HORATIO
text: Let Him bless thee too.

speaker: SAILOR
text: He shall, sir, an ’t please Him. There’s a letter

speaker: SAILOR
text: for you, sir. It came from th’ ambassador that was

speaker: SAILOR
text: bound for England—if your name be Horatio, as I

speaker: SAILOR
text: am let to know it is.

speaker: HORATIO
text: Horatio, when thou shalt have

speaker: HORATIO
text: overlooked this, give these fellows some means to the

speaker: HORATIO
text: King. They have letters for him. Ere we were two days

speaker: HORATIO
text: old at sea, a pirate of very warlike appointment gave

speaker: HORATIO
text: us chase. Finding ourselves too slow of sail, we put on

speaker: HORATIO
text: a compelled valor, and in the grapple I boarded them.

speaker: HORATIO
text: On the instant, they got clear of our ship; so I alone

speaker: HORATIO
text: became their prisoner. They have dealt with me like

speaker: HORATIO
text: thieves of mercy, but they knew what they did: I am to

speaker: HORATIO
text: do a good turn for them. Let the King have the letters

speaker: HORATIO
text: I have sent, and repair thou to me with as much speed

speaker: HORATIO
text: as thou wouldst fly death. I have words to speak in

speaker: HORATIO
text: thine ear will make thee dumb; yet are they much too

speaker: HORATIO
text: light for the bore of the matter. These good fellows

speaker: HORATIO
text: will bring thee where I am. Rosencrantz and Guildenstern

speaker: HORATIO
text: hold their course for England; of them I have

speaker: HORATIO
text: much to tell thee. Farewell.

speaker: HORATIO
text: He that thou knowest thine,

speaker: HORATIO
text: Hamlet.

speaker: HORATIO
text:
Come
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              give
               
              you
               
              way
               
              for
               
              these
               
              your
               
              letters

speaker: HORATIO
text:
And
               
              do
               
              ’t
               
              the
               
              speedier
               
              that
               
              you
               
              may
               
              direct
               
              me

speaker: HORATIO
text:
To
               
              him
               
              from
               
              whom
               
              you
               
              brought
               
              them
              .
